about_the_game:
Welcome to Survivor World! Are you ready to step into a world of adrenaline-fueled competition, challenging courses, and strategic moves? Here, you won't be fighting for survival in the wilderness, but rather using your intellect and skills for your team's victory. The rivalry between two teams, the blue and the red, unfolds. Both teams will race to reach a predetermined number first, and it's only achievable through your team's success.


Teams will race through obstacle-filled tracks. They'll encounter skill-demanding obstacles such as challenging tunnel passages, leaping from high platforms, and maintaining balance on the course.


During the competitions, each player must showcase their best performance to earn points for their team. Overcoming obstacles, maintaining balance, and making strategic moves are essential. Contributing to your team's victory is crucial.


It's not just about physical strength but also about strategy. Choosing which player participates in which race, planning tactics, and identifying the weaknesses of the opposing team are crucial. You need to be not only strong but also smart.


The first team to reach the predetermined number will win Survivor World, savoring an unforgettable victory. But this is just the beginning! The fire of competition will never die out, and with each step, an even more challenging battle awaits. Are you ready? Welcome to Survivor World!

name: Survivor World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Conquer obstacles, and strategies for victory. Blue vs. red teams race to a goal, relying on intellect and skill, not wilderness survival. Only team success counts. Ready for the ultimate showdown?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Czech, Polish, Russian, Turkish
